plot: A woman is abducted from her home and forced into a basement where she must confront the terrifying realities of herself and her past.
title: The Judas Cradle
plot_es: A woman is abducted from her home and forced into a basement where she must confront the terrifying realities of herself and her past.
plot_en: A woman is abducted from her home and forced into a basement where she must confront the terrifying realities of herself and her past.
